com.chipsandwaycool.servlet.utility

类 MadnessWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elseforif.servlet.utility.HTMLWriter
      • com.elseforif.servlet.utility.HTMLFlexiWriter
        • com.chipsandwaycool.servlet.utility.MadnessWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MadnessConstants, HTMLConstants
    直接已知子类:
    MadnessWriterSkin1

    public class MadnessWriter
extends HTMLFlexiWriter
implements MadnessConstants
    This class extends HTMLFlexiWriter to add output services specific to the March Madness Web site. The design is to make it as simple as possible for servlets to output a page--encapsulating any HTML constructs which may be common to more than one servlet--without sacrificing any flexibility.

    Most servlets will call 'printPreContent()' first, to output everything up to the specific content of each one; and then 'printPostContent()' will complete the page, closing any tags opened by the former method.

    The 'PAGE_STATE...' constants are just a means of keeping rough track of where we are in the page output, in case an exception is thrown. This allows us, in most cases, to output an error message and complete the page in a coherent fashion.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MadnessWriter

        public MadnessWriter(java.io.PrintWriter output,
                     java.lang.String contextPrefix)
        Construct a MadnessWriter wrapper for PrintWriter 'output'. Add the given context prefix to all URLs outputs that begin with "/".
        参数:
        output - the PrintWriter I will use for 'write...()' calls.
        contextPrefix - the context prefix under which I'm running.

    • 方法详细资料

      • printPreContent

        public void printPreContent()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Output the first part of a page, including the HEAD tag, the opening BODY tag, and any content common to most pages on this site.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printPreContent

        public void printPreContent(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String additionalHeadStuff)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Output the first part of a page, including the HEAD tag, the opening BODY tag, and any content common to most pages on this site.
        参数:
        title - a title for the page
        additionalHeadStuff - any other content to be added to the HEAD tag
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printBeginHEAD

        public void printBeginHEAD(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String additionalStuff)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Output a beginning HEAD tag with page title 'title' and including the code in 'additionalAttributes', if any.

        This method is an override of superclass HTMLWriter. Effectively, it just adds some default tags to the 'additionalStuff' argument, which is then passed back up to the superclass. 'printHEAD()', which is called in 'printPreContent()' above, invokes this method.
        覆盖:
        printBeginHEAD 在类中 HTMLWriter
        参数:
        title - the page title
        additionalStuff - any extra code to be inserted between the HEAD tags.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printPostContent

        public void printPostContent()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Output the last part of the page, any footer-type content, etc., making sure any tags opened by 'printPreContent()' are duly closed.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printMenu

        public void printMenu(java.lang.String sourceURL)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Output a "box" containing a menu of links for those who have logged in, not including the administrative options. Exclude the link for 'sourceURL', since that is that page we're now displaying.
        参数:
        sourceURL - the URL to be excluded
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printBeginBox

        public void printBeginBox()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Output some tags to begin some sort of box-like structure. Call this method to begin the box, then output its contents, and last call 'printEndBox()' to complete the construct.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printBeginBox

        public void printBeginBox(boolean center)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Output some tags to begin some sort of box-like structure. Call this method to begin the box, then output its contents, and last call 'printEndBox()' to complete the construct. Center the contents of the box, iff 'center'.
        参数:
        center - whether the contents of the box should be centered
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printEndBox

        public void printEndBox()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Close any tags opened by 'printBeginBox()', completing the box.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

        Output a simple page indicating an error of some kind.
        参数:
        error - the error itself
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • printBeginTD

        public void printBeginTD(int colspan,
                         int rowspan,
                         java.lang.String attributes,
                         java.lang.String style)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Write a custom opening TD tag. This is overridden just to add a newline, which is not done in the superclass for reasons of browser compatibility.
        覆盖:
        printBeginTD 在类中 HTMLWriter
        参数:
        colspan - the number of columns the TD should span
        rowspan - the number of rows the TD should span
        attributes - any additional attributes needed for the tag
        style - an optional CSS style name for the cell
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

        public void printCSVString(java.lang.String value)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Output a string value into a CSV file, enclosing it in quotes (if it is not null) and escaping any embedded quotes as needed.
        参数:
        value - the string value
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
